title: "Crossplag launches AI Content Detector to help universities uphold academic integrity"
excerpt: "The rise of AI-generated content poses a real threat to academic integrity, where Crossplag has passionately worked for more than six years. Besides offering translation plagiarism checking, Crossplag felt the need for a tool that allows educators to know whether the content is genuine or whether AI produced it."
